channel.title: Need help with 317 PI MODICONS
channel.description: Well my MODICONS were packed and i used toms cache suite and i got them out and put them in a folder "players" in the sprites, and i added a admin crown crowns there were originally Donator, Mod, and Owner crown, so I've decided to add a admin crown, and now there all over the place, the new owner crown looks like a donor crown, could someone please help me, like i need to have the client read the folder " players " where the modicons are located and i need to have the MODICONS read in order, as in Donator gets donor crown, mod gets mod crown etc, in order, im sorry if this thread didn't make much sense but I've been looking for tutorials and i cant find any, if you could please help id much appretiate it, Add me on skype if I'm not on mopar " twistedrh " and maybe instead of explaining it all and having all this confusion if you can help me via team-viewer that would be great thanks bye

item.title: Need help with 317 PI MODICONS
item.dc:creator: @ice_pkz ice pkz
item.description:
@ice_pkz wrote:

I am still having trouble could you please add me on skype? " twistedrh " its in client.java but its just really confusing

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 317 PI MODICONS
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

go to your client and type in the name of the saved packed file/modicon title?

it’s quite easy…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 317 PI MODICONS
item.dc:creator: @ice_pkz ice pkz
item.description:
@ice_pkz wrote:

Well my MODICONS were packed and i used toms cache suite and i got them out and put them in a folder “players” in the sprites, and i added a admin crown crowns there were originally Donator, Mod, and Owner crown, so I’ve decided to add a admin crown, and now there all over the place, the new owner crown looks like a donor crown, could someone please help me, like i need to have the client read the folder " players " where the modicons are located and i need to have the MODICONS read in order, as in Donator gets donor crown, mod gets mod crown etc, in order, im sorry if this thread didn’t make much sense but I’ve been looking for tutorials and i cant find any, if you could please help id much appretiate it, Add me on skype if I’m not on mopar " twistedrh " and maybe instead of explaining it all and having all this confusion if you can help me via team-viewer that would be great thanks bye
